title: Global barley producers by country 2018/19
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount in million metric tons for 17 number of Countrys.
The Amount in million metric tons is highest at Country European Union and lowest at Country Belarus.
The lowest value at Country Belarus is 33.14x times less than the highest value at European Union.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Amount in million metric tons in the y axis.
The maximum Amount in million metric tons 56.34 is found at Country European Union and the minimum is found at Belarus where Country is 1.7.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Amount in million metric tons for 17 number of Countrys.
The Amount in million metric tons is highest at Country European Union and lowest at Country Belarus.
The lowest value at Country Belarus is 33.14x times less than the highest value at European Union.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Amount in million metric tons in the y axis.
The Amount in million metric tons is highest at Country European Union and lowest at Country Belarus.
There is a difference of 54.64 between the maximum Country European Union and minimum Country Belarus.
Country European Union is higher than any other Countrys with value 56.34, followed by Russia, and Others. Down to Country Belarus with the lowest value 1.7.
Similar Amount in million metric tons is found in Country Ukraine, and Turkey.
The average Amount in million metric tons in all 17 Countrys is 8.27.
The Amount in million metric tons is 140.6 if we add up values of all Countrys.
